quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk. In a world that is changing quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You are the author of your destiny; write a story worth telling.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Chase your dreams, but always know the road that will lead you home again.
quotes.author: Tim McGraw

quotes.quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
quotes.author: Dan Reeves

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: He who is not a good servant will not be a good master.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The more we value things outside our control, the less control we have.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Man is affected, not by events, but by the view he takes of them.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche (Influenced by Stoicism)

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: No person has the power to have everything they want, but it is in their power not to want what they don't have, and to cheerfully put to good use what they do have.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Don't seek for everything to happen as you wish it would, but rather wish that everything happens as it actually will—then your life will flow well.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The greatest blessings of mankind are within us and within our reach. A wise man is content with his lot, whatever it may be, without wishing for what he has not.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: To live a good life: We have the potential for it. If we can learn to be indifferent to what makes no difference.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Nature has intermingled pleasure with necessary things—not in order that we should seek pleasure, but in order that the addition of pleasure may make the indispensable means of existence attractive to our minds.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with those who inspire your growth and bring out your best self.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking

quotes.quote: Your mind's thoughts paint the canvas of your soul.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking

quotes.quote: Stop debating what's right; embody the goodness you seek.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking

quotes.quote: External troubles are reflections of your perception; change your view, and you regain control.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking

quotes.quote: Let go of what you can't control, and you'll find more power in what you can.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking

quotes.quote: Challenges don't make things hard; our fear of trying does.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking

quotes.quote: Stay calm first; then, confront reality with clarity.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking

quotes.quote: Events have no power over you; your perspective does.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking

quotes.quote: A strong purpose can carry you through any circumstance.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking

quotes.quote: Instead of wishing for control, wish for the wisdom to flow with life's currents.
quotes.author: The Geordie Viking
